subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Kyle Okposo and Trent Hunter scored power-play goals, and Joey MacDonald made 29 saves to lead the Islanders to a 3-1 win over the Senators at Ottawa on Thursday night.
snippet: Kyle Okposo and Trent Hunter scored power-play goals, and Joey MacDonald made 29 saves to lead the Islanders to a 3-1 win over the Senators at Ottawa on Thursday night.
